def min_steps_to_transform_array(n, b):
    p = 1
    k = 0
    for i in range(n):
        k += abs(b[i] - p)
        p = b[i]
    return k

def min_steps_to_transform_array(n, b):
    p = -1
    k = 0
    for i in range(n):
        k += abs(b[i] - p)
        p = b[i]
    return k

def min_steps_to_transform_array(n, b):
    p = 1
    k = 0
    for i in range(n):
        k += abs(b[i] - p)
        p = b[i]
    return k

    p = 0

def min_steps_to_transform_array(n, b):
    p = 0
    k = -1
    for i in range(n):
        k += abs(b[i] - p)
        p = b[i]
    return k

def min_steps_to_transform_array(n, b):
    p = 0
    k = 1
    for i in range(n):
        k += abs(b[i] - p)
        p = b[i]
    return k

def min_steps_to_transform_array(n, b):
    p = 0
    k = 0
    for i in range(n):
        k -= abs(b[i] - p)
        p = b[i]
    return k

def min_steps_to_transform_array(n, b):
    p = 0
    k = 0
    for i in range(n):
        k += abs(b[i] + p)
        p = b[i]
    return k

def min_steps_to_transform_array(n, b):
    p = 0
    k = 0
    for i in range(n):
        k += abs(b[i] * p)
        p = b[i]
    return k
